snippet: Armed with a hefty dividend, Xerox Corp shares look cheap even as they have shot up this year following the company's spin-off of its business processing business, according to an article in Barron's....

headline.main: Lester Tenney, 96, Dies; Faced Japan’s Brutality and Won Its Apologies
headline.print_headline: Lester Tenney, 96, Dies; Faced Japan’s Brutality and Won Its Apologies

lead_paragraph: Armed with a hefty dividend, Xerox Corp shares look cheap even as they have shot up this year following the company's spin-off of its business processing business, according to an article in Barron's.
